dialogue.text: Scintillating performance, sport!
Look at the audience, everyone's cheering for you!
(The studio audience consists of at least seventeen poorly-drawn cutouts of Raymond...)
(...Lottie, who’s looking pretty proud of herself after remembering to play the 'applause' track...)
(...though she's unknowingly let the calculator fall into the negatives…somehow...)
(...And Chrissy, who has just finished drinking apple juice from a Raymond-shaped cup.)
(She crumples it up and throws it into a trashcan halfway across the room.)
I hope your name doesn’t start with an L, ya green alien thing! I’m gonna go chug a can of water.
(Jeez, maybe I was a bit too optimistic about my chances of fitting in.)
--BZZZT-- You've received messages from ''SecretaryDoggo!''
--Don't listen to that dumb cat, fluffy heaven~--
--Raymond’s rude to everyone he perceives as threat--
--Well...more rude than usual :P--
--Thanks, honestly I wouldn’t have gotten a single note out if you weren’t here---
--But at the same time, I could still screw everything up at a moment's notice.--
--Well, I’m not too great at giving advice, but I know this much…--
--T-then...
--...Consider this next song for you!--
--''F-Fluffy h...heaven?” 0-0--
--Teehee :3c--
Ah! Welcome back, everyone! Now that you are all tuning in...
Let's rock this world, chap!
